p:
The common genes were analyzed using the online tool STRING (
https://string-db.org ), and the protein-protein interaction (PPI) network based on the criterion of a combined score > 900 was constructed and displayed using Cytoscape software. Genes were ranked based on their degree of connectivity with other genes. The pROC package in R 25 was used to calculate the the area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) for the top 100 genes showing the greatest connectivity in the PPI network.
